channel.title: ♫ ♪-Crappy Cache, Not HD. Replaced Textures [EASY TO DO] - ♪ ♫
channel.description:
[b][i]I recovered the thread and put it back from numerous requests. I found it annoying listening to them so I re-posted. Enjoy.[/i][/b]
This is NOT HD in any way. It's simply edited textures which is easy as hell to do.
[center]PURPOSE: To replace the shitty original Bluurr's cache with this to improve clients.
HIGHLY UPDATED AS OF 6/17/09!
Scroll down for Updates V2
Some of the models may be different, just add them if you're not a noob. Only takes 3 seconds.
No more glitches with the fence or anything.[/center]
[center]UPDATES V1[/center]
[center][i][b]New varrock textures
[img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/9889/imp1.png[/img]
Experimental Firecape Model
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=350scwx&s=5]View My Video[/url]
Edgevile [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/8243/gr2.png[/img]
Duel Arena [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/3542/gr3.png[/img]
Fence Cache Fix. ( NO MORE RUNNER HATS )
[img]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/5874/69220083.png[/img]
Barrows tomb brightness changed
[img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/4465/30088211.png[/img]
Improved floor in slayer tower
[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/1824/95819421.png[/img]
[/b][/i][/center]
[b]Link - http://uppit.com/v/9I7KHON8
Mirror1 - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GMTOQ2R7]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GMTOQ2R7[/url]
Mirror2 - http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=f0daa35367a7553a00d27174b47c6657e04e75f6e8ebb871[/b]
[center]UPDATES V2!
[b][i][u]New Prayer Icons![/u][/i][/b]
[IMG]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/4376/22744007.png[/img]
[b][i][u]New Hit Splash![/u][/i][/b]
[IMG]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/3958/hitsplash.png[/img]
[b][i]More Realistic looking water![/i][/b]
[IMG]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8948/update.png[/img]
[b][i][u]New lava textures. (Wear firecape, watch it move and you will pee your pants.)[/u][/i][/b]
[IMG]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/4365/update2.png[/img][/center]
Reason for editing fire cape:
Every notice how our 'fire' cape is made of lava? It always bugged and I finally found a texture that is fire. So now the 'fire' cape will live to it's true name!
[b]
Link - http://uppit.com/v/WYRUUUON
Mirror 1 - http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=54d93d5de5f2dce2931c7453395df025f22b438f0c50a68b5621d66e282a0ee8[/b]
[quote="Jc22493"]Those prayer icons are fucking sexy.[/quote][/i]
[quote="cocoa"][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=368670.msg2845194#msg2845194 date=1246225931] Not hard to do, yet everyone seems to think you're amazing? [/quote]
Not hard, but did you release one? It's still time consuming.
[quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=368670.msg2845194#msg2845194 date=1246225931] [quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=368670.msg2832911#msg2832911 date=1245468848] [quote author=propaganda link=topic=368670.msg2832450#msg2832450 date=1245450936] you dont just change the ground and some items and call it hd besides, 317-474 cant hd [/quote] Acually your wrong. With alot of edits to the client you can make it load the HD models and use all HD textures in it (but the textures can already be done) and i believe SilentCJ has already done the HD model thing (i could be wrong) [/quote]
He's replaced the old character models with the HD ones. That's all. It doesn't make his client HD at all. [/quote]
Then what does?
[quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=368670.msg2845194#msg2845194 date=1246225931] [quote author=Aeolian link=topic=368670.msg2839823#msg2839823 date=1245891533] meh, I might remove this. Got 508 dat. files loaded to a 317 now. [/quote] If you mean shit like the seq.dat and everything, I highly doubt that. Since you'd have to re-write nearly everything. If you mean models, then that's easy. [/quote]
You're an idiot
I approve of this post.[/quote]

Hamachi is unpoplar so not many people have it.

item.dc:creator: @ljay_wilson ljay wilson
item.description:
@ljay_wilson wrote:

dude totally should put the ancient magicks cape on here i would use x[) TOTALLY SEXY![quote=“Aeolian, post:1, topic:279334”]I recovered the thread and put it back from numerous requests. I found it annoying listening to them so I re-posted. Enjoy.

This is NOT HD in any way. It’s simply edited textures which is easy as hell to do.

[center]PURPOSE: To replace the shitty original Bluurr’s cache with this to improve clients.

HIGHLY UPDATED AS OF 6/17/09!

Scroll down for Updates V2

Some of the models may be different, just add them if you’re not a noob. Only takes 3 seconds.

No more glitches with the fence or anything.[/center]

[center]UPDATES V1[/center]

[center][i][b]New varrock textures

Experimental Firecape Model

View My Video

Edgevile

Duel Arena

Fence Cache Fix. ( NO MORE RUNNER HATS )

Barrows tomb brightness changed

Improved floor in slayer tower

[/b][/i][/center]

[b]Link - http://uppit.com/v/9I7KHON8

Mirror1 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GMTOQ2R7

Mirror2 - http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=f0daa35367a7553a00d27174b47c6657e04e75f6e8ebb871[/b]

[center]UPDATES V2!

New Prayer Icons!

New Hit Splash!

More Realistic looking water!

New lava textures. (Wear firecape, watch it move and you will pee your pants.)

[/center]

Reason for editing fire cape:

Every notice how our ‘fire’ cape is made of lava? It always bugged and I finally found a texture that is fire. So now the ‘fire’ cape will live to it’s true name!

[b]

Link - http://uppit.com/v/WYRUUUON

Mirror 1 - http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=54d93d5de5f2dce2931c7453395df025f22b438f0c50a68b5621d66e282a0ee8[/b]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=375353.msg2829090#msg2829090 date=1245261864]
Those prayer icons are fucking sexy.
[/quote][/i]

[quote author=cocoa link=topic=368670.msg2845313#msg2845313 date=1246232187]

Not hard to do, yet everyone seems to think you’re amazing?

Not hard, but did you release one? It’s still time consuming.

you dont just change the ground and some items and call it hd
besides, 317-474 cant hd

Acually your wrong. With alot of edits to the client you can make it load the HD models and use all HD textures in it (but the textures can already be done) and i believe SilentCJ has already done the HD model thing (i could be wrong)

He’s replaced the old character models with the HD ones. That’s all.
It doesn’t make his client HD at all.

Then what does?

meh, I might remove this. Got 508 dat. files loaded to a 317 now.

If you mean shit like the seq.dat and everything, I highly doubt that. Since you’d have to re-write nearly everything.
If you mean models, then that’s easy.

You’re an idiot

I approve of this post.
[/quote][/quote]
